'''''The Town Where Only I Am Missing''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete {{Quest|Cold Case Commission}}.

==Trivia==
* The title of this achievement is a reference to the manga ''{{w|Erased (manga)|Erased}}'', the original Japanese title of which is {{Lang|ja=僕だけがいない街|ja_rm= Boku dake ga Inai Machi}}, meaning ''"The Town Where Only I am Missing"''.
